sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: A reminder of our top story.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Speaking in Strasbourg on Europe's Day, French President Emmanuel Macron suggested Ukraine could join a parallel European community, while also saying it will be decades for Ukraine to be accepted into the European Union.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: With a stroke of a pen, U.S. President Joe Biden has signed a bill streamlining the process

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: to supply Ukraine with military equipment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: JOE BIDEN, U.S. President, United States of America, I'm signing a bill that provides another important tool in our efforts to support the government of Ukraine and the Ukrainian people in their fight to defend their country and their democracy against Putin's brutal war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: And it is brutal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Biden's signature will make it easier for the U.S. to lend or lease military weapons, such as Javelin missiles, to Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Under the measure, Ukraine can make a request for the weapons, and the U.S. will then get a guarantee that Ukraine will replace or reimburse the assets at a later date.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The legislation invoked the Lend-Lease Act, which the U.S. used to support allies during World War II, including the former Soviet Union. Last week, the Biden administration announced a new weapons package for Ukraine worth 141 million euros. And it brings the total value of the U.S.'s military aid commitment to the country up to 3.6 billion euros since the war began in late February.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: A French appeal court has upheld the conviction of the former French Prime Minister Francois

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Fillon and his wife Penelope for embezzling public funds in a fake job scandal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: The sentence, announced on Monday, reduced the original five-year term imposed in 2020 to four years, three of which were suspended.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: He was also given a fine of €375,000.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: His wife Penelope was fined the same amount and given a suspended two-year prison sentence, again reduced by one year from the original three-year prison term. In 2017, the satirical newspaper Le Canal Enchaîné broke the story of the couple's embezzlement in an affair nicknamed Penelopegate, which derailed Fillon's campaign to be the right-wing candidate in the 2017 presidential election. In the initial 2020 judgment, the Fions were ordered to repay Parliament more than €1 million in misappropriated public funds. Neither François Fion nor his wife chose to be present at the Paris Court of Appeal's decision today, but their lawyers said that they would appeal the ruling in France's highest court.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: said that they would appeal the ruling in France's highest court. Sri Lankan Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa has stepped down following weeks of protests

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: over the country's worst economic crisis in decades. The Indian Ocean Island nation is on the brink of bankruptcy. The resignation comes after authorities deployed armed troops in the capital Colombo on Monday after an attack by government supporters on protesters camped outside the offices of the President and Prime Minister.

sentences.sentence: For several months, Sri Lankans have endured long lines to buy fuel, cooking gas, food and medicine, most of which come from abroad. The UK's Queen Elizabeth will miss the state opening of Parliament for only the third time

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: in her reign. The 96-year-old monarch, who's experiencing mobility issues, will not read the traditional Queen's speech at the opening of the new session of Parliament. Instead, her son, the Prince of Wales, will read it on her behalf in an unprecedented move in modern history.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09

sentences.sentence: Andy Warhol's Sought Sage Blue, Maryland set a new auction record.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: It is now the most expensive artwork by a U.S. artist ever sold at auction after it went for €184 million on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The painting's price tag actually hit just below a previous prediction of €189 million made by Christie's Auction House in New York earlier this year. Kjell Andersen, KFK TV It's time for the next delegation.
